review: I and my husband visited Dr Sweta Raje for counselling about family planning. As I was not able to conceive, there were few issues in the reports that suggested unovulation. After a year of medication, she suggested us to opt for follicular scan when the reports seemed bit better and told us to try for 3 months. She was so friendly and positive that we never got disappointed and were always in a good hope. And finally we got the results within a month of the follicular study and I conceived. She is very patient and friendly and very approachable. Just need to have faith in her treatment and you are sure to get the result. ! Little higher on expense but definitely worth the wait and money !
